original_text: And Nebuzaradan the captain of the guard took them and brought them to the king of Babylon at Riblah.
korean_text: 시위대장 느부사라단이 그들을 사로잡아 가지고 립나 바벨론 왕에게 나아가매

sentences.original_text: And Nebuzaradan the captain of the guard took them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 시위대 장관 느부사르단이 그들을 잡아

sentences.original_text: and brought them to the king of Babylon at Riblah
